quoteText: During and after expiry of this period, we will continue to use data which does not identify individual users in an aggregated form.Â  We use this aggregated data for data analysis, trend identification and research purposes, for example to gain insights about our users and to make improvements to our website.
title: The service may keep a secure, anonymized record of users' data for analytical purposes even after the data retention period

tosdr.case: The service may keep a secure, anonymized record of users' data for analytical purposes even after the data retention period
